original_text: But as soon as this thy son was come, which hath devoured thy living with harlots, thou hast killed for him the fatted calf.
korean_text: 아버지의 살림을 창녀들과 함께 삼켜 버린 이 아들이 돌아오매 이를 위하여 살진 송아지를 잡으셨나이다

sentences.original_text: But as soon as this thy son was come
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 이 네 아들이 왔을 때

sentences.original_text: which hath devoured thy living with harlots
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 창녀들과 함께 네 살림을 탕진하였는데

sentences.original_text: thou hast killed for him fatted calf
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 그를 위해 살진 송아지를 잡았구나
